bug.author: caisq
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
1.2.1 <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
Chrome (Linux) "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/75.0.3770.100 Safari/537.36" The error occurs when starting transfer learning: rand.ts:119 Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read property 'toString' of null at new t (rand.ts:119) at randomUniform_ (array_ops.ts:192) at randomUniform (operation.ts:45) at dropout_ (dropout.ts:51) at dropout (operation.ts:45) at tfjs_backend.ts:669 at engine.ts:393 at t.scopedRun (engine.ts:404) at t.tidy (engine.ts:391) at Oe (globals.ts:169) Need to confirm on other devices.
